ch0338_00_sazare/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey there! I’ve been waiting here on
standby for you, kiddo!
ch0338_00_sazare/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s get right to it. Can I snap a photo of
you real quick?
ch0338_00_sazare/7101_0701_01_10:
I’m working as a photographer at Blueberry
Academy, as a trial.
ch0338_00_sazare/7101_0701_02_10:
I’ve been taking all sorts of photos from
different angles to show what the academy
is like!
ch0338_00_sazare/7101_0701_03_10:
I’m going to take tons of great photos here
on Pasio to show how cool sync pairs are!
ch0338_00_sazare/7102_0701_01_10:
One must-have for photographers is
stamina!
ch0338_00_sazare/7102_0701_02_10:
It’s pretty common to camp out for days to
not miss the perfect photo op!
ch0338_00_sazare/7103_0701_01_10:
There are all sorts of camera app features
nowadays!
ch0338_00_sazare/7103_0701_02_10:
As a photographer, I’ve been studying up on
properly using filters and such!
ch0338_00_sazare/7103_0701_03_10:
It’s interesting how you can capture a
different vibe than what you’d get with
your usual camera!
ch0338_00_sazare/7104_0701_01_10:
As my family always says—
“Time wasted is lost!”
ch0338_00_sazare/7104_0701_02_10:
Once time passes, it’s gone...
Never to return.
ch0338_00_sazare/7104_0701_03_10: That’s why you should treasure the present!
ch0338_00_sazare/7105_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! How’d you
like to be my assistant?
ch0338_00_sazare/7105_0701_02_10:
I ask because I’ve seen what you can do,
so I know you’d be good at it!
ch0338_00_sazare/7105_0701_03_10:
I could get lots of photos of sync pairs with
you around!
ch0338_00_sazare/7105_0701_04_10:
And I’d be sure to splurge on a reward,
so give it some thought, OK?
ch0338_00_sazare/1701_0701_01_10:
Hey, great timing, kiddo! I have something to
give you!
ch0338_00_sazare/1701_0702_01_10:
Yes, perfect! Your expression just now
was totally worth it!
ch0338_00_sazare/2501_0701_01_10:
In the past, my home used to be called the
Hisui region.
ch0338_00_sazare/2501_0701_03_10: If changes like that are part of history...
ch0338_00_sazare/2501_0701_04_10:
then maybe pictures are an important way
to preserve that history—and those who
lived through it.
ch0338_00_sazare/2501_0702_01_10:
In the past, taking even a single photo took
a while to set up.
ch0338_00_sazare/2501_0702_02_10:
That’s why there aren’t too many photos that
depict the lives of people and Pokémon back
then.
ch0338_00_sazare/2501_0702_03_10:
Time is precious! So are photos from
the past!
ch0338_00_sazare/2511_0701_01_10:
I can say this because it’s you, but a while
back, I was actually in a bit of a slump.
ch0338_00_sazare/2511_0701_02_10:
I was frustrated because none of my photos
seemed to turn out well.
ch0338_00_sazare/2511_0701_03_10:
But I met a Trainer who helped me go on a
photo-taking adventure, which helped me
shake that off!
ch0338_00_sazare/2511_0702_01_10:
If you ever lose confidence in something you
love, maybe try what I did.
ch0338_00_sazare/2511_0702_02_10:
Just dive right in without holding back!
Remembering what it was like when you
started can open new paths!
ch0338_00_sazare/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! Can I get a nice shot of you kicking
off your day?
ch0338_00_sazare/3003_0701_01_10:
Every experience is valuable! It’s important
to take detours in life sometimes, you know?
ch0338_00_sazare/3005_0701_01_10:
The moon looks so beautiful... Maybe I
could set up a tent and capture this moment.
